name: Dogologue
description:
A very short Visual Novel done for the O2A2 Again Jam! Go through a short conversation with your new TV Dog college roommate!

Everything was done on Ren'py with me making the assets, code and pretty much everything else within 24 hours because I have no self control! (Literally spent the whole week fiddling with GUI settings and didn't even do anything cool with them sjdjskdks)I hope you'll enjoy this neat little project though! Definitely want to get better with Ren'py and game making in general ^^
